summary: A FedEx invoice dated December 16, 2002, for account holder Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges for 21 express shipments and 1 ground shipment from November and December 2002. The document lists recipients of packages, including Ghislaine Maxwell, Alan Dershowitz, and other associates.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder and shipper for all FedEx shipments on this invoice. His address is listed as 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY.

persons.name: G Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of multiple FedEx packages shipped from Jeffrey Epstein's account in December 2002. The name appears as both 'G MAXWELL' and 'Recipient: G MAXWELL'.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight envelope shipped from Epstein's account on December 11, 2002, and delivered on December 12, 2002.

persons.name: Edwina Simmonds
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight package on December 10, 2002. Also listed as the 'Signed by' party for another shipment to Murray Gell-Mann.

persons.name: Murray Gell-Mann
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight envelope shipped from Epstein's account on December 10, 2002, with reference 'MG-M PERSONAL'.

persons.name: C. Snyder
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx 2Day envelope shipped on December 11, 2002, with the package 'Signed for' by this individual.

persons.name: Peg Ugland
persons.context: Listed as the 'Reconsignee' for a shipment on December 11, 2002, to 'N A PROPERTY'.

persons.name: Song
persons.context: Listed as the 'Reconsignee' for a shipment to 'G MAXWELL' on December 14, 2002.

persons.name: B. Bonnett
persons.context: Listed as the 'Reconsignee' for a third-party shipment from the 'LONDON FOG COMPANY' to 'NICK SIMMONS' and 'EPSHEN INTEREST' on December 4, 2002.

persons.name: Nick Simmons
persons.context: Recipient of a third-party FedEx Priority Overnight shipment from the LONDON FOG COMPANY, billed to Epstein's account, on December 6, 2002.

connections.description: Epstein paid for multiple FedEx shipments sent to Ghislaine Maxwell in December 2002.
Epstein paid for a FedEx shipment sent to Alan Dershowitz in December 2002.
Simmonds is listed as a recipient of a package and as the signatory for another, suggesting a staff or assistant role.
Epstein paid for a personal FedEx shipment (reference 'MG-M PERSONAL') sent to physicist Murray Gell-Mann.

events.title: FedEx Shipments from Epstein
events.description: A series of 21 FedEx Express shipments and 1 Ground shipment were made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to various recipients over approximately one month.

events.title: Invoice Payment Due
events.description: The total invoice amount of $444.19 was due for payment by December 31, 2002.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022 (Epstein's billing/shipping address)
Long Lake, MN 55356 (Address for LONDON FOG COMPANY, a third-party shipper)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's primary New York address in 2002 was 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022.
Epstein's FedEx account was used to send packages to Ghislaine Maxwell on multiple occasions in December 2002.
A package was sent to attorney Alan Dershowitz via FedEx Standard Overnight in December 2002.
The invoice shows Epstein's account was used for a third-party shipment from the LONDON FOG COMPANY to Nick Simmons and 'EPSHEN INTEREST'.
The document provides a detailed log of Epstein's shipping activity and financial expenditures for a one-month period in late 2002.
